comment: <1>Please don't take it too seriously. It's just for fun.</1>
question: Question

backToSchool.q: If you could go back to the past in high school, what would you do?
backToSchool.a: Read as many books as I can

impressiveMoment.a: When a friend of mine said I'm in good company

hardestMoment.q: When's your hardest moment for you?
hardestMoment.a: When I miss people but I'm not able to meet them

wish.a: There's a moment where I want to go back

badHabit.a: Eating a big meal once a day

important.q: The most important thing in your life?

scariest.q: The most scariest thing in your life?

peopleTalk.q: How do you want people to talk about you?

hotpot.q: Food you wanna eat right now?

confidence.q: What part of your personality are you most confident about?

happy.a: "If you think you are, then you are" - my dad

cool.q: What do you wanna say to yourself?

night.q: What do you do before bed?

morning.q: What do you do after waking up?

song.q: Which song are you listening to recently?

dream.q: What's the most recent dream you had?
dream.a: I said I can't sleep well!

wallpaper.q: What's the wallpaper on your phone?

cooking.q: What food are you good at?

book.q: What's the most recent book you read?

mavic.q: What do you want to gift yourself?

born.q: If you were to be born again, what would you want to be?
